name: First Try, No Deaths
description:
This game was made for the GameDev.tv 2022 Game Jam (May 20th to May 30th, 2022), under the jam's theme:

DEATH IS ONLY THE BEGINNING!

Reach the goal at the end of the level as the world crumbles around you.  You only get one try, so make it count!

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys: move

Shift: sprint (at the cost of stamina)

Space: jump

This game uses free assets (as per the rules of the jam), including:

Action RPG Music Free -- VGcomposer (Unity Asset Store)

Ultimate Animated Character Pack -- (quaternius.com)

Skybox Series Free -- Avionx (Unity Asset Store)

Links:
